title: DLSA Koraput Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Para Legal Volunteer Posts
description: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA Koraput) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Para Legal Volunteer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Intermediate (10+2) can grab this chance and apply for the DLSA Koraput Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date ...
